text: (me andamatama) movunta pera nuhuge janatavada, ovungen pasu pæmini (sæma) samuhayakda (apage ayavan) boru kalaha. tavada (ovungen) sæma janatavakma taman veta pæmini dutayinva (ghatanaya kirimatada, sirabarayata) gænimatada adahas kalaha. tavada satyaya vinasa kara dæmima sandaha boru karanavan magin (ovun samaga) tarka kalaha. ebævin ovunva (danduvama magin) api alla gattemu. ebævin (ovunta niyama karana lada) mage danduvama kese tibuneda (yanna avadhanaya karanu mænava)
